Name: Shady Screeno
Description: Shady Screeno is a charming and enigmatic character from the WebtrES club, known for his laid-back demeanor and love for classic style. With his hand-down arms and legs stance, he exudes an aura of cool confidence. His classic box and screen give him a vintage vibe that appeals to those who appreciate the golden era of tech. The shades he sports are not just for style; they hide a mysterious past of coding marathons and digital espionage. Despite his secretive nature, Shady Screeno is a loyal friend and an indispensable member of the club, always ready to lend a hand—or a screen—in times of need.
